sentences.en: Actually in the nature, the gecko is wise, time crisis cuts tail runs away.
sentences.cn: 其实自然界中, 壁虎就是其中智者, 危机之时断尾而逃.

sentences.en: Firstly and domestic status of research on gecko robot is introduced and analyzed in detail.
sentences.cn: 首先,详细介绍和分析了国内外仿壁虎机器人的研究现状.

sentences.en: Furthermore, we imitate gecko's movement, and try to design applicable mechanism and control gecko robot's behavior.
sentences.cn: 并且仿照壁虎的运动模式, 进而设计机器机构与控制运动行为.

sentences.en: Gecko : The fuzzy one, Thank you!
Gecko : The long one. Thank you!
Gecko mom took little gecko to walk on the lawn.
sentences.cn: 壁虎妈妈带着小壁虎在草地上散步.

sentences.en: He foresees robots with gecko - like feet.
sentences.cn: 他预见机器人将会有壁虎一样的脚.

sentences.en: It's also possible to have Gecko run directly from a network drive or CD.
sentences.cn: 同样可以让Gecko通过网络驱动器或CD直接运行.

sentences.en: LIU Jun Li, the gecko's turnover this year will reach about 100 million yuan, and profits.
sentences.cn: 李柳军介绍, 今年壁虎的营业额将会达1亿元左右, 实现盈利.

sentences.en: Maybe a little frog on my hip, or a gecko.
sentences.cn: 也许在臀部刺一只小青蛙还是壁虎什么的.

sentences.en: Ridge Long gecko, carved wall carved eaves, the grand and spectacular.
sentences.cn: 脊龙壁虎, 檐雕墙刻, 宏伟而壮观.

sentences.en: The average lifespan of the House Gecko is 5 to 10 years.
sentences.cn: 家中壁虎的生命基本上维持在五到十年. 那么你说的壁虎就是早恋咯?

sentences.en: The gecko's thumbs can stick to glass.
sentences.cn: 壁虎脚上的吸盘可以吸住玻璃.

sentences.en: The modern gecko's length of body will not surpass 16 inches.
sentences.cn: 现代壁虎的体长不会超过16英寸.

sentences.en: The only catch is, you might get a house gecko infestation next.
sentences.cn: 唯一的风险是，接下来你有可能要面对壁虎成灾噢。

sentences.en: The only place they didn't check was under the bed, where the gecko was - big as ever, and full at last.
sentences.cn: 只有一个地方他们没有检查，那就是床底下，壁虎其实就在那儿——还是那么大，但是终于吃饱了。

sentences.en: There is a gecko in the tree.
These compounds may help protect the delicate hairs on the gecko's toes, as the hairs never showed any signs of wear.
sentences.cn: 这类化合物可能有助于保护壁虎脚趾上的细微毛发，这也印证了这些毛发从来没有磨损的痕迹。
